price: 18. Sima lisusu nani akoyebisa yo nini yango mokolo ya mbano?
arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: thumma mā adrāka mā yawmu al-dīni
